title: exsoft
author: exsoft
created_time: May 09, 2023, 11:16:39 AMLast edit: May 09, 2023, 11:39:47 AM by exsoft
content: eXsoft.io  offers you a script for cryptocurrency exchanger with a recognizable, professionally executed, user-friendly, intuitive interface. After all, you can start a ready-made crypto business now. eXsoft.io is a perfect ready-made soft for cryptocurrency exchanger, which offers such services:- Connection of fiat currencies (UAH, USD, EUR) and TOP-60 cryptocurrencies, including stablecoins.- Clear business model.- Data security (built-in two-factor authentication (2FA), high quality protection against DDoS-attacks).- Module for multilevel affiliate programs.- Extended system of financial reporting.- Automatic exchange to any fiat or cryptocurrency.- Integration of leading payment systems via API.- Marketing module, which allows you to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns on different platforms.Do you already have an exchanger, do you only need a cryptocurrency gateway? — We have a ready-made solution!Do you need to quickly connect the exchanger? Do you need to connect new crypto exchanges? Do you need a payment system for mass payments (batch)? — We have a ready-made solution! Our advantagesPackadges, payouts, patchesMake mass payouts (batches) in a unified location. Save your time and resources, and trust it to professionals.DashboardYour personal account will contain all necessary tools to track requests, analytics of the exchanger, as well as the client base.ReportingYou will be able to track the overall statistics on the system's profit requests, referrals, and other useful information on the admin panel.Quick integrationQuick integration will save you time in configuring and implementing the necessary tools for functionality as well as cryptocurrencies.FlexibilityThe flexibility of eXsoft implies universally applicable solutions to each client's needs, requirements and budget.Security and protectionWe will provide your business with maximum security and protection, as we consider it the most important aspect of any cryptocurrency exchange.Our services and solutionsSoftware as a Service (SaaS): setup or rentConsulting and softwareOptions: Design, Dev Support, Marketing, Full stackTo receive technical documentation, write us a request! If you have any questions, contact us!
